text: Tini balalena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara amake jana'o, ami yadi amara raba prerita spasta pramane pratisthita haye thaki ebam tini yadi amake tamra nija anugraha [1] dana kare thakena, tabe allah‌ra sasti theke amake ke raksa karabe, ami yadi tamra abadhya ha'i? Kaje'i tomara to sudhu amara ksati'i bariye diccha
